sk1.name: Wraithfire Blast
sk1.desc: Wraith King sears an enemy unit with spectral fire, dealing damage and stunning, then dealing damage over time and slowing the target.

sk2.name: Vampiric Aura
sk2.desc: Nearby friendly units gain hit points based on their damage dealt when attacking enemy units.

sk3.name: Mortal Strike
sk3.desc: Wraith King passively gains a chance to deal bonus damage on an attack.

sk4.name: Reincarnation
sk4.desc: Wraith King's members regroup after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle. Upon death, enemy units in the area will be slowed by 75%%.
